title: In 2 months, Riven would be 8 yo yet, she has no chroma for her original Championship skin
body: Hear me out Riot, I've been playing riven since she came out and her championship skin she has nothing particular ( no particules, same artwork as 2016 one,  no real animation like dawnbringer) nothing, just rework her original skin and make her a chroma. riot pls ;_;
